Summary: Glowing blue light, hovered for a moment behind clouds, then sped off
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Victoria
There was one other sighting in Victoria on or around January 26th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsWas at work having cigarette. Noticed bluish light hovering around level of cloud cover. Watched it for around thirty seconds, then it took off in a northern direction. Oddly, though I don't know if it's related or not, the weather got much rougher after it had left, and the area experienced winds of up to 60kmph afterwards.
